verbs.description: literally nobody [V: should] be surprised by an urban earthquake a new report from the u s geological survey says the biggest danger may be the hayward fault because 2 million people live directly on top of it united states geological survey hayward fault berkeley california san francisco bay area san francisco dr ken hudnut hayward
